LanguageData.XP_RestartNoteHeader_Description: Mod settings do not take effect until after you restart RimWorld!
LanguageData.XP_SearchHeader_Description: These options control which surgery operations the patcher should look for when applying them to pawn definitions.
LanguageData.XP_SearchAdminsterRecipes_Description: Look through all "Administer Ingestible" and "Administer Usable Item" bills
LanguageData.XP_SearchInstallNaturalBodyPartRecipes_D: Look through all "Install Natural Body Part" operations
LanguageData.XP_SearchInstallArtificialBodyPartRecipe: Look through all "Install Artificial Body Part" operations. Disabling this option also effectively disables the Artificial Parts → Mechs toggle.
LanguageData.XP_SearchInstallImplantRecipes_Descripti: Look through all "Install Implant" operations, such as brain implants like Joywires.
LanguageData.XP_PatchHeader_Description: These options control what kind of patching jobs are ran to match surgery operations from one kind of pawn to other pawn definitions.
LanguageData.XP_PatchAnimalToAnimal_Description: Patch animal surgical operations into other animals
LanguageData.XP_PatchHumanlikeToHumanlike_Description: Patch humanlike surgical operations into other humanlikes
LanguageData.XP_PatchArtificialToMech_Description: Patch artificial body part operations into any mech-like creature
LanguageData.XP_PatchAnimalToHumanlike_Description: Patch animal surgical operations into humanlikes
LanguageData.XP_PatchHumanlikeToAnimal_Description: Patch humanlike surgical operations into animals
